pageContext.claim: “Democrats also continue to encourage foreign interference in our elections by refusing to support a simple and beautiful thing called voter ID.”
pageContext.analysis: Citing baseless claims, Trump asked Ukraine to announce an investigation into Joe Biden, a potential Democratic opponent in the 2020 election. His 2016 campaign knew about and welcomed Russian efforts to help, though there was not enough evidence of a conspiracy. Meanwhile, voter fraud cases are extremely rare in the United States and voter-ID laws favored by Republicans have been found to deter minority voters.
